ðŸ“– Summary: Cronboard is a terminal-based dashboard for managing cron jobs on local and remote servers. It allows users to easily add, edit, delete, pause, and resume cron jobs, as well as view their status and run times. The application connects to servers using SSH and provides autocompletion and validation features for creating and editing cron jobs.
